title: bann ? is that real ?? xaxaxa

replies.body:
Deserved.

All you did was flame.
I can definitely see how someone should be banned off this. Getting the "I'm blue" lyrics wrong is the first reason...

> [{quoted}](name=Gabriella,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ru47ABE6,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-10-15T22:12:54.375+0000)

This is my favorite part.

the irony {{sticker:sg-lulu}}
xaxa people from silver and gold not to post comment please. Guys this is something joke, how i get perma banned when i not flame nobody and i was not toxic, tell me how ?? This corrupt game.

> [{quoted}](name=Gabriella,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ru47ABE6,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-10-15T22:33:50.486+0000)
>
> xaxa people from silver and gold not to post comment please. 

This is a public forum, and you don't have to be at X rank in order to contribute to a discussion about player behavior.

>Guys this is something joke, how i get perma banned when i not flame nobody and i was not toxic, tell me how ?? This corrupt game.

Calling for reports, harassing sona for not building how you wanted her to build (tank instead of AP in this case) and just overall just being a jerk by harassing your teammates. Is this permaban worthy? No. Is this punishment worthy? Yes.
One of the things that contributed to your punishment is asking for people to report. If you cut that out, there's a decent possibility that your next account won't be punished nearly as often.

>Gabriella: no you will get banned
Gabriella: for flame
Gabriella: so enjoy you
Gabriella: ;)
Gabriella: i not flame so idc for your report
Gabriella: riot can do nothing

https://i.imgur.com/ujaK3CB.gif

https://imgur.com/a/FHXLj

13 losses in a row. 8 of them from yesterday and the others from two weeks ago when i assume the 2 week ban happened

has nobody ever told you that playing on tilt is not a good ideea? **ESPECIALLY** after a 2 week ban?

{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

First, threatening reports.  There is no need for it and is often considered harassment.

Second, harassing Sona about her build. She didn't build what you wanted?  Big deal.  

Third, giving up on the game.  Your teammates are playing to win and you just gave up.

Those are all reasons for getting a punishment.  Thing is, this kind of behavior would have gone through 2 chat restrictions and a 2-week ban.  That tells me it's a consistant pattern of behavior.  You didn't learn anything from your previous restrictions.
